controls.title: REPLACE_ME
Ensure Mounting Of Cramfs Filesystems Is Disabled
Ensure Mounting Of Squashfs Filesystems Is Disabled
Ensure Usb Disabled
Ensure A Separate Partition Exists For /Tmp
Ensure Correct Mounting Options Set On /Tmp Partition
Ensure A Separate Partition Exists For /Dev/Shm
Ensure Correct Mounting Options Set On /Dev/Shm Partition
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Aide Is Installed
Ensure Filesystem Integrity Is Regularly Checked
Ensure Ima Is Enabled
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Gpgcheck Is Globally Activated
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Message Of The Day Is Configured Properly
Ensure Local Login Warning Banner Is Configured Properly
Ensure Remote Login Warning Banner Is Configured Properly
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Motd Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Issue Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Issue.Net Are Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Secure Boot Is Enabled
Ensure Bootloader Password Is Set
Ensure Permissions On Bootloader Config Are Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Selinux Is Enabled By Grub2
Ensure Selinux Is Set To Enforcing Mode
Ensure Selinux Policy Is Configured
Ensure No Unconfined Services Exist
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Time Synchronization Is In Use
Ensure Chrony Is Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Firewalld Is Installed
Ensure Firewalld Is Enabled And Configured
Ensure Nftables Is Installed
Ensure Nftables Is Enabled And Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Avahi Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Cups Is Not Installed
Ensure Rsync Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Ldap Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Xinetd Is Not Installed
Ensure Nis Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Telnet Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Dns Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Ftp Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Tftp Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Http Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Samba Is Not Installed
Ensure Http Proxy Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Snmp Server Is Not Installed
Ensure Rsh Is Not Installed
Ensure Imap And Pop3 Server Is Disabled
Ensure Rpc Service Is Disabled
Ensure Dhcp Service Is Disabled
Ensure Nfs Service Is Disabled
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Ip Forwarding Is Disabled
Ensure Packet Redirect Sending Is Disabled
Ensure Source Routed Packets Are Not Accepted
Ensure Icmp Redirects Are Not Accepted
Ensure Secure Icmp Redirects Are Not Accepted
Ensure Suspicious Packets Are Logged
Ensure Broadcast Icmp Requests Are Ignored
Ensure Bogus Icmp Responses Are Ignored
Ensure Reverse Path Filtering Is Enabled
Ensure Tcp Syn Cookies Is Enabled
Ensure Ipv6 Router Advertisements Are Not Accepted
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Dccp Is Disabled
Ensure Sctp Is Disabled
Ensure Wireless Interfaces Are Disabled
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Auditd Is Installed
Ensure Auditd Service Is Enabled
Ensure Auditing For Processes That Start Prior To Auditd Is Enabled
Ensure Audit_Backlog_Limit Is Sufficient
Ensure Audit Rules Are Immutable
Ensure Audit Log Size Is Configured
Ensure Audit Logs Are Not Automatically Deleted
Ensure System Is Disabled When Audit Logs Are Full
Ensure Auditd Log Rotation Is Configured
Ensure Login And Logout Events Are Collected
Ensure Session Events Are Collected
Ensure Events That Modify User/Group Information Are Collected
Ensure Kernel Module Loading And Unloading Is Collected
Ensure Sudo Commands Are Collected
Ensure The Events That Modify The Sudoers File Are Collected
Ensure Events That Modify Date And Time Information Are Collected
Ensure Events That Modify The System'S Network Configuration Are Collected
Ensure Events That Modify The Systems Mandatory Access Control (Mac) Settings Are Collected
Ensure Discretionary Access Control Permission Modification Events Are Collected
Ensure Successful File Access Is Audited
Ensure Unsuccessful File Access Attempts Are Collected
Ensure File Deletion Events By Users Are Collected
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Rsyslog Is Installed
Ensure Rsyslog Is Enabled
Ensure Rsyslog Default File Permissions Are Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Journald Is Enabled
Ensure Journald Is Configured To Send Logs To Rsyslog
Ensure Journald Is Configured To Compress Large Log Files
Ensure Journald Is Configured To Write Logfiles To Persistent Disk
Ensure Journald Is Disabled From Receiving Logs From A Remote Client
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Cron Daemon Is Enabled
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Crontab Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Cron.Hourly Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Cron.Daily Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Cron.Weekly Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Cron.Monthly Are Configured
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Cron.D Are Configured
Ensure Cron Is Restricted To Authorized Users
Ensure At Is Restricted To Authorized Users
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Permissions On /Etc/Ssh/Sshd_Config Are Configured
Ensure Ssh Permitemptypasswords Is Disabled
Ensure Ssh Root Login From Remote Is Disabled
Ensure Ssh Permituserenvironment Is Disabled
Ensure Ssh Protocol Is Set To 2
Ensure Ssh X11 Forwarding Is Disabled
Ensure Ssh Disallows Tcp Forwarding
Ensure Ssh Ignorerhosts Is Enabled
Ensure Ssh Hostbasedauthentication Is Disabled
Ensure Ssh Pam Is Enabled
Ensure Ssh Warning Banner Is Configured
Ensure Ssh Access Is Limited To Authorized Users
Ensure Ssh Loglevel Is Appropriate
Ensure Ssh Maxauthtries Is Set To 4 Or Less
Ensure Ssh Maxsessions Is Set To 10 Or Less
Ensure Ssh Maxstartups Is Set Properly
Ensure Ssh Logingracetime Is Set To 1 Minute Or Less
Ensure Ssh Idle Timeout Interval Is Configured
Ensure Ssh Macs Are Configured
Ensure Ssh Ciphers Are Configured
Ensure Ssh Key Exchange Algorithms Are Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Password Creation Requirements Are Configured
Ensure Password Hashing Algorithm Is Sha-512
Ensure Password Expiration Is 180 Days Or Less
Ensure Minimum Days Between Password Changes Is Configured
Ensure Password Expiration Warning Days Is 7 Or More
Ensure Inactive Password Lock Is 30 Days Or Less
Ensure All Users Last Password Change Date Is In The Past
Ensure Accounts Locked After 5 Failed Logins Is Configured
REPLACE_ME
Ensure System Accounts Are Secured
Ensure Default Group For The Root Account Is Gid 0
Ensure Default User Shell Timeout Is Configured
Ensure Default User Umask Is Configured
Ensure Passwords Are Set In Single User Mode
Ensure Display Of Failed Login Attempts Is Configured
Ensure Every Uid Is Unique
Ensure Account Name Is Unique
Ensure Every Gid Is Unique
Ensure Every Group Name Is Unique
Ensure Accounts Related Files Have Correct Permissions
Ensure All Users' Home Directories Exist
Ensure All Users' Home Directories Permissions Are 750 Or More Restrictive
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Sudo Is Installed
Ensure Sudo Commands Use Pty
Ensure Sudo Log File Exists
Ensure Sudo Is Limited To Authorized Users
Ensure Users Must Provide Password For Privilege Escalation
REPLACE_ME
Ensure No World Writable Files Exist
Ensure No Unowned Files Or Directories Exist
Ensure No Ungrouped Files Or Directories Exist
Audit Suid Executables
Audit Sgid Executables
Ensure No Users Have .Forward Files
Ensure No Users Have .Netrc Files
REPLACE_ME
Ensure Address Space Layout Randomization (Aslr) Is Enabled
Ensure Core Dumps Are Restricted
Ensure Dmesg Access Permission Is Correct
Ensure Kernel Kptr_Restrict Is Configured
